source:
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("/Users/feddah/desktop/HR-Employee.csv")
df.head()

df.Attrition.value_counts().plot(kind='bar')
plt.suptitle('Number of Employee Attrtion ')
plt.xlabel('Attrtion')
plt.ylabel('# of Employee')
plt.show()

# how many employees in each department

df.Department.value_counts().plot(kind='bar')
plt.suptitle('Number of Employee in each department ')
plt.xlabel('Department')
plt.ylabel('# of Employee')
plt.show()

# How many of them are male and female 
df.Gender.value_counts().plot(kind='bar')
plt.suptitle('Number of Male and Female Employee ')
plt.xlabel('Gender')
plt.ylabel('# of Employee')
plt.show()

# How many employee in each differeent education field
df.EducationField.value_counts().plot(kind='bar')
plt.suptitle('Number of employee in each differeent education fields')
plt.xlabel('Gender')
plt.ylabel('# of Employee')
plt.show()

# How many employee travel rarely? frequeently? not travel at all? 

df.BusinessTravel.value_counts().plot(kind='pie')
plt.suptitle('Number of Employee in each Business Travel Category')
plt.show()
